name:name: # ^ This file demonstrates several advanced features:
# ^ bossType: references BossType enum defined in THIS expansion package
# ^ level: uses 'bossLevel' (extends core's 'level' which extends ubyte; chained custom type, min=50)
# ^ hpType: uses 'intTypeName' (ANCESTOR CONSTRAINT - only accepts names of types extending integer)
# ^   Valid values include: hitPoints, bossHp, bossLevel, ubyte, uint, etc.
# ^ element: uses 'advancedElement' (restricts core Element enum to Shadow, Light, Fire)
# ^   BaseStats is {attack:integer,defense:integer,speed:integer} defined in core Manifest.
# ^   The extends syntax adds enrageThreshold, creating {attack,defense,enrageThreshold,speed}.
# ^   Point2D is {float,float} defined in core Manifest. Extends to {float,float,float} (3D).
# ^ reward: NON-TRIVIAL UNION integer|string - gold amount (integer) OR special reward name (string)
# ^ lootTable: array {name} referencing item names from core package
shadowLord
description:text: The lord of the shadow realm, master of darkness

name:name: infernalGuardian
description:text: An ancient fire guardian bound to protect the realm gate

name:name: lightbringer
description:text: The primordial being of pure light, final boss of the expansion
